author: Mail On Sunday Reporter
title: Barclays customers cut off from cash in computer crash | Daily Mail Online
text: Thousands of Barclays customers were stuck without cash yesterday and branches forced to close after the bank’s computers crashed. Customers were left stranded while using cash machines and paying for restaurant meals with cards. Barclays refused to say how many of its 15 million card customers were affected, but there were thousands of complaints on social media during the ‘black-out’ around lunchtime. Customers were left stranded while using cash machines and paying for restaurant meals with cards RELATED ARTICLES
